Class Trapezoid

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShapeBaseClass
      • TwoDimensionalShapes
        • Trapezoid

  • public class Trapezoid
extends TwoDimensionalShapes
    The Trapezoid class extends the TwoDimensionalShapes. The methods that are specific to this class is the setters and getters for the instance fields, calculateArea function and calculatePerimeter function which calculates the area the perimeter respectively given the dimensions of the trapezoid

        Constructor with the 6 arguments. The
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the trapezoid
        dimX - the dimensions of the trapezoid on the x axis
        dimY - the dimensions of the trapezoid on the y axis
        dimXTop - the top dimensions of the trapezoid on the x axis
        sideA - one side of the trapezoid
        sideB - one side of the trapezoid
